name: Awesome

name: Jane
title: Meeting Time
message: Would you consider moving the starting time 30 minutes to about 6pm. It's tough to make it to the meetings on time right after work.

name: Roy
title: Great Speaker
message: I really enjoyed the speaker this month. Would love to hear another presentation.
